about_the_game:
STORY 

You'll cum for the sex but stay for the story. (But then quickly find more sex...it's a vicious cycle!) 

After being rejected by the prom-date-of-your-dreams, Scarlett University becomes your desperate attempt for validation that leads you down a steamy path of personal corruption. Here, you’ll discover life with your AURA–the SU exclusive vibrator that shapes and enhances your desire to fuck your way through life. Combine that with the sensual simulation department, and now you’ve got a messy recipe for sexually charged mayhem!

  • 9 core characters and over a dozen extras

  • ~10 hours of story content (100,000+ words)

  • Multiple endings

  • Replay your favorite moments and CGs with the gallery!

Beautiful hand drawn character art and CGs that cater to a wide range of fetishes and scenarios.

CONTENTS 

  • 40+ CGs (not including variations)

  • Solo female, MF, FF, MFF, MMF, MMFF, MFFFF, FMMMM+

  • Oral sex, Anal sex, Foot job, Tit job, Hand job, Cream pie

  • Sex toys

  • Lingerie + outfits

  • Public sex

  • BDSM

  • Machines

  • Femdom, Pegging

FULL LOVENSE TOY INTEGRATION 

Feel every thrust, buzz, suck, stroke and more! Get yours now!

Scarlett University was built from the ground up to be an immersive experience with your own toys. But what if I don't have a toy? Use your game controller instead! The vibration mirror feature allows you to feel it all. Play one handed or even hands-free so you can focus on the juicy parts!

Your education begins soon...

content_descriptors.notes:

name: Scarlett University

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i-series 4000 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i-series 6000 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1660ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Enter Scarlett University, a thrilling visual novel adventure where the stakes are as high as the heels! Discover provocative machines and lusty opportunities at this elite all-girl finishing school. Will you give in to your deepest desires? Just don't tell Mom what you're up to!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
